text: In A Taste of Honey Mr. Richardson has taken a town in the industrial North of England and has made it live. The shabby streets and wet pavements, the school head-stones in the churchyard, "sacred to the memory of- are seen as an integral part of the story.
handwritten_text: In A Taste of Honey Mr. Richardson has taken a town in the industrial North of England and has made it live. The shabby streets and wet pavements, the school head-stones in the churchyard, "sacred to the memory of- are seen as an integral part of the story.
